summary: A drama based on a memoir about growing up as a member of the Urka community in the small republic of Transnistria.
cast: Arnas Fedaravicius|Vilius Tumalavicius|Eleanor Tomlinson|Jonas Trukanas|Vitalij Porshnev|Peter Stormare|John Malkovich|Arnas Sliesoraitis|Pijus Grude|Ernestas Markevicius|Erikas Zaremba|Airida Gintautaite|Arvydas Lebeliunas|Viktoras Karpusenkovas|Daiva Stubraite|Jokubas Bateika|Mindaugas Ancevicius|Marijus Bagdonavicius|Jokubas Bareikis|Jonas Cepulis|Juozas Gaizauskas|Kestutis Stasys Jakstas|Dainius Jankauskas|Aram Kian|Denisas Kolomyckis|Vaidas Kublinskas|Bogdan Kumshatsky|Paulius Markevicius|Aleksas Martinkus|Giedrius Nagys|Mindaugas Papinigis|Francis Pardeilhan|Andrius Paulavicius|Vytautas Rumsas|Edward Saszko|Giedrius Savickas|Donatas Simukauskas|Ramunas Simukauskas|Aleksandr Spilevoj|Antanas Surgailis|Paulius Tamole|Marek Toth|James Tratas|Donatas Vaisnoras|Julius Zalakevicius|Riccardo Zinna
